api_list.name: POST_Products_Post
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://altoviz.p.rapidapi.com/v1/Products"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "altoviz.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

isSalePriceTaxIncluded.description: Indicates whether sale price include vat

availableForSales.description: Indicate whether the product can be sale

api_list.name: POST_SaleInvoices_Finalize

isDraft.description: Indicates whether invoice is draft. Otherwise invoice cannot be modified

useTaxIncludedPrices.description: Indicates whether invoice prices and amount are tax included

classificationId.description: Classification ID (should be defined if line is product or service)

isSalePriceTaxIncluded.description: Indicates whether sale price include vat

availableForSales.description: Indicate whether the product can be sale
